snippet.title: Comic Books for Girls
snippet.description: Comic books aren't just for boys anymore. A new wave of girl-centric comics are on the shelves and worth checking out.

snippet.title: Pow! Using Comic Books to Get Kids Reading
snippet.description: Your best tool for encouraging kids to read may be something parents and educators once considered the enemy: comic books.

snippet.title: Comic-Con: How Is It For Kids?
Comic-Con Goodies â€“ Movie News on Bolt and Up
Lots More Scoop from Comic-Con: Igor, Toys, Ben 10 and More!
Movie Review: The Hulk (2003)
snippet.description: The Hulk lacks personality; not a great movie.

snippet.title: Movie Review:The Dark Knight
snippet.description: Not just your 'CRASH!' 'WHIZ' 'BANG!' comic book movie, The Dark Knight's nightmarish villain and the deaths of some major characters require a know-your-kid judgement call before you buy tickets.

snippet.title: TV Review: Last Comic Standing
snippet.description: Comedians compete in so-so reality show. Teens OK.

snippet.title: Review: Spider-Man 3
snippet.description: Kids'll be dazzled, but story falls short of the previous sequel.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Penny Arcade Adventures: On the Rain-Slick Precipice of ...
snippet.description: Web comic game has plenty of sordid humor
